Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 The dark spark sensed a familiar presence. An old warrior of his. he sent 
him a typed message to halucienagen. It read. "Hello young warrior. We faught 
side by side for a short while. And i was very impressed by you. And 
hopefully we will again. I shall return soon. And all of the bots on this 
planet will burn under our touch. See you soon." The spark pulsed. It needed 
to get into contact with darkefate. He was an important piece to this puzzle 
he was createing.

--part1_10e.3c4cc23.28a76923_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
